alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 10:17PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN WESTCHESTER COUNTY THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 1017 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yorktown Heights, or near Peekskill, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ossining, Peekskill, Mount Kisco, Greenwich, Hawthorne, Bedford, Yorktown Heights, Jefferson Valley, Croton-on-Hudson, Briarcliff Manor, Pleasantville, Armonk, Thornwood, Buchanan, and Golden`s Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
